contents.p: The coffin PAHMA 6-19912 has two lines of inscription running vertically down the lid of the coffin from below the collar to the toes. These read in a retrograde fashion, with the first column on the mummy’s right and the second on the mummy’s left. The animal figures facing to the mummy’s left. The inscription is derived from a combination of Book of the Dead spells 51 and 52.

text.desc: Central columns on lid, reading retrograde and containing Book of the dead spell 51/52.

frag.al: Dd [mD.w] in wsir mn1 b<w>.t=i sp-sn n wnm=i n xd2.n=i Hr=f b<w>.t=i pw Hs
frag.tr: Saying by the Osiris so-and-so: My Abomination! My Abomination! I shall not eat (it). I have not stepped on it. My abomination is feces.

frag.tr: I shall not eat it, namely, dung. The Osiris so-and-so shall not fall. Oh, Mistress of the Sycamore, {Iwefaa}, Hathor5.
